memberdef.name: ENQUEUE_THREAD
memberdef.initializer: do { \ OSThread* __prev = (queue)->tail; \ if (__prev == NULL) \ { \ (queue)->head = (thread); \ } \ else \ { \ __prev->link.next = (thread); \ } \ (thread)->link.prev = __prev; \ (thread)->link.next = 0; \ (queue)->tail = (thread); \ } \ while (0)

memberdef.name: DEQUEUE_THREAD
memberdef.initializer: do { \ OSThread* __next = (thread)->link.next; \ OSThread* __prev = (thread)->link.prev; \ if (__next == NULL) \ { \ (queue)->tail = __prev; \ } \ else \ { \ __next->link.prev = __prev; \ } \ if (__prev == NULL) \ { \ (queue)->head = __next; \ } \ else \ { \ __prev->link.next = __next; \ } \ } \ while (0)

memberdef.name: ENQUEUE_THREAD_PRIO
memberdef.initializer: do { \ OSThread* __prev; \ OSThread* __next; \ for (__next = (queue)->head; __next && (__next->priority <= (thread)->priority); \ __next = __next->link.next) \ {} \ \ if (__next == NULL) \ { \ ENQUEUE_THREAD (thread, queue, link); \ } \ else \ { \ (thread)->link.next = __next; \ __prev = __next->link.prev; \ __next->link.prev = (thread); \ (thread)->link.prev = __prev; \ if (__prev == NULL) \ { \ (queue)->head = (thread); \ } \ else \ { \ __prev->link.next = (thread); \ } \ } \ } \ while (0)

memberdef.name: DEQUEUE_HEAD
ASSERTREPORT
memberdef.initializer: if (!(cond)) \ { \ OSReport ("OSCheckActiveThreads: Failed " #cond " in %d\n", line); \ OSPanic (__FILE__, line, ""); \ }

memberdef.argsstring: (OSThread *thread, void *(*func)(void *), void *param, void *stack, u32 stackSize, s32 priority, u16 attr)
memberdef.name: OSCreateThread
